item.description:
El Meetup de enero fue muy divertido, y vamos a regresar a Savant Project de nuevo!

Fue algo muy especial ir a un bar y escuchar a todos hablando completamente en espanol! Fue tanta gente que llenamos el bar.

Espero verles alli!

----------------------------------

TAPAS! DRINKS! LATIN MUSIC! SOCIAL ATMOSPHERE! PLENTY OF SPACE!
GET UP AND WALK AROUND, MEET NEW PEOPLE!
THIS PLACE IS REALLY NICE AND HAS A VERY HIP AND COZY VIBE. WE HAVE SO MANY PEOPLE SIGNED UP I THINK WE MAY END UP WITH THE WHOLE PLACE TO OURSELVES!
WE MAY EVEN DANCE LATER IF WE WANT.... (ask if you are interested)

Parking, public transportation, photos and additional information available on their website: http://www.thesavantp....

The Savant Project se encuentra en Mission Hill, enfrente de la parada de Brigham Circle (Brigham and Women's Hospital/ Longwood area) en la linea verde/ "E" tren, o media milla de la parada de Roxbury Crossing por la linea naranja. Hay estacionamiento cerca tambien, en el parqueo de Stop and Shop atras de TGIF's y JP Licks... Esta al lado de Harvard School of Public Health en la esquina de Tremont y Huntington (also called Avenue of the Arts).







(Sorry, I am trying to figure out how to change the default setting for Red Line. We will not meeting at the Red Line again, so please ignore any messages about Red Line.)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the front corner of the bar to welcome you. I'll be giving out nametags.
item.why: This place has great food and fun cocktails. Try some of their tapas! Imagine an entire bar full of people speaking in Spanish. Sit and converse over dinner with other Spanish speakers at a table, in the lounge or at the bar, or stand and mingle.

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Spanish Language Febrero Meetup
